title: A Tale of 'O' on being different
brief_description: Rosabeth Moss Kanter (narrator) explores the consequences of being different. It focuses on a group where there are ‘the many’, referred to as the ‘X’s‘ and ‘the few’, referred to as the ‘O’s’. What makes a person an X or an O?
